WorkItem.Description: It would be nice to have a config item for the location of the CharacterProfile.lua. Everytime I do a Save As for one of my characters, I have to relocate the directory for the CharacterProfiler.lua. It would also be good to remember which directory I save my character profiles to, as well.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.LoadCharacter] Config item for CharacterProfiler.lua location
